line_1: Subscrib'd at HOOKHAM'S, saw the papers;
line_2: For he, to keep him from the vapours,

line_1: By swallowing Stuff she has read in the Papers,
line_2: Or a ravenous Pica, so brought on the Vapours

line_1: Yet these, and not sententious Papers,
line_2: Must brighten Life, and cure the Vapours, &c.
